stations.name: Hunt Valley
stations.description: Northern terminus of the Light RailLink system, located in Hunt Valley, Baltimore County. Large park-and-ride facility.

stations.name: Pepper Road
stations.description: Surface station in the Hunt Valley area, opened as part of the 1997 northern extension.

stations.name: McCormick Road
stations.description: Surface station near McCormick & Company headquarters in Hunt Valley.

stations.name: Gilroy Road
stations.description: Surface station in the Timonium area of Baltimore County.

stations.name: Warren Road
stations.description: Surface station with park-and-ride facility in the Timonium area.

stations.name: Fairgrounds
stations.description: Formerly Timonium Fairgrounds, this was the original northern terminus when the system opened in 1992. Located adjacent to the Maryland State Fairgrounds.

stations.name: Timonium Business Park
stations.description: Surface station serving the Timonium business park area of Baltimore County.

stations.name: Lutherville
stations.description: Surface station with park-and-ride facility in the Lutherville-Timonium community.

stations.name: Falls Road
stations.description: Surface station with park-and-ride facility adjacent to Lake Roland and the Robert E. Lee Memorial Park.

stations.name: Mt Washington
stations.description: Surface station in the Mt Washington neighborhood of Baltimore.

stations.name: Cold Spring Lane
stations.description: Surface station at Cold Spring Lane in northern Baltimore.

stations.name: Woodberry
stations.description: Surface station in the Woodberry neighborhood, near the Meadow Mill development and Clipper Mill.

stations.name: North Avenue
stations.description: Street-running station on Howard Street at North Avenue. Adjacent to the light rail maintenance facility. Served by both the main line and Penn-Camden shuttle.

stations.name: University of Baltimore/Mt Royal
stations.description: Street-running station on Howard Street near the University of Baltimore and Maryland Institute College of Art. The Penn Station spur diverges near this station.

stations.name: Cultural Center
stations.description: Street-running station on Howard Street near the Lyric Opera House and Joseph Meyerhoff Symphony Hall. Walking distance to the Metro SubwayLink State Center station.

stations.name: Centre Street
stations.description: Street-running station on Howard Street at Centre Street in downtown Baltimore.

stations.name: Lexington Market
stations.description: Street-running station on Howard Street adjacent to the historic Lexington Market. Transfer point to the Metro SubwayLink system via a short walk to the underground metro station.

stations.name: University Center/Baltimore Street
stations.description: Street-running station on Howard Street at Baltimore Street, near the University of Maryland, Baltimore campus.

stations.name: Convention Center
stations.description: Street-running station on Howard Street near the Baltimore Convention Center.

stations.name: Camden Yards
stations.description: Street-running station near Oriole Park at Camden Yards and the historic Camden Station. Southern terminus of the Penn-Camden shuttle. Adjacent to the Camden MARC station for Amtrak and MARC Camden Line service.

stations.name: Stadium/Federal Hill
stations.description: Infill station formerly known as Hamburg Street, opened in 1998 adjacent to M&T Bank Stadium (home of the Baltimore Ravens). Initially a game-day-only stop, it became a full-time daily station in 2005.

stations.name: Westport
stations.description: Surface station in the Westport neighborhood of South Baltimore.

stations.name: Cherry Hill
stations.description: Surface station serving the Cherry Hill community of South Baltimore.

stations.name: Patapsco
stations.description: Surface station near the Patapsco River crossing. The BWI Airport branch diverges south of this station.

stations.name: Baltimore Highlands
stations.description: Surface station in the Baltimore Highlands community of Anne Arundel County.

stations.name: Nursery Road
stations.description: Surface station with park-and-ride facility near Nursery Road in Linthicum Heights.

stations.name: North Linthicum
stations.description: Surface station in the North Linthicum area of Anne Arundel County.

stations.name: Linthicum
stations.description: Junction station where the BWI Airport branch diverges from the main line. Park-and-ride facility available.

stations.name: Ferndale
stations.description: Surface station in the Ferndale community of Anne Arundel County.

stations.name: Cromwell Station/Glen Burnie
stations.description: Southern terminus of the main line, located in Glen Burnie, Anne Arundel County. Large park-and-ride facility.

stations.name: BWI Business District
stations.description: Surface station serving the BWI Business District office park area near the airport.

stations.name: BWI Airport
stations.description: Terminus of the BWI Airport branch, providing direct rail access to BWI Thurgood Marshall Airport. Connected to the airport terminal via a covered walkway.

stations.name: Penn Station
stations.description: Northern terminus of the Penn-Camden shuttle, located adjacent to Baltimore Penn Station. Provides connections to Amtrak Northeast Corridor and MARC Penn Line commuter rail services.
